name: Jecht Battle
overview: A two player Gloom Mod using elements from Final Fantasy X created by nittamituaki and released in2014. In each level, your objective is to find an exit before your 3 lives run out. In specific levels, you must defeat (or escape) enemy bosses. It features cooperative 2 player gaming. Blood options can be set to level of comfort, including Meaty/Nasty Mode where enemy larvae explode more violently but disappear quickly and Messy/Dirty Mode where all larvae of defeated enemies will remain on the ground where they died until the level is completed.
